summary: Disaster after disaster, an already frail man descends into madness after his talking dog announces that he is actually his defence lawyer.
cast: Paddy Considine|Miranda Pleasence|Simon Greenall|Richard Lumsden|Christopher Ettridge|Hayley Bird|Eve Darby MacLennan|Geoffrey Beevers|Christopher Morris|Phil Cornwell|Ged Day|Tom Panton|Michelle Hebbron|Isabel Mitchell|Samuel Mitchell
title: My Wrongs 8245-8249 and 117
